item.title: Experience the rich history and art at Apricot Hotel in Hanoi
item.description:
Source: Apricot Hotel website. Hanoi’s latest luxury hotel, Apricot Hotel, is now open in the heart of Vietnam’s cultural and political center, with a grand opening planned for later this summer*. The 10-story Apricot Hotel, formerly the Ph√∫ Gia Hotel, a renowned gathering place for the city’s elite since the 1920s, holds significant historical weight. This five-star hotel offers stunning views of Hoan Kiem Lake and Hanoi’s Old Quarter. It boasts 123 neo-classical rooms, two restaurants, a lobby lounge, a cafe, a rooftop bar with a heated swimming pool, meeting rooms, a spa, and a fitness center...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-rich-history-and-art-at-apricot-hotel-in-hanoi/
